title: PaperChase
abstract: Letters and Corrections1 May 1987PaperChaseWARNER V. SLACK, M.D., HOWARD L. BLEICH, M.D.WARNER V. SLACK, M.D.Search for more papers by this author, HOWARD L. BLEICH, M.D.Search for more papers by this authorAuthor, Article, and Disclosure Informationhttps://doi.org/10.7326/0003-4819-106-5-782 SectionsAboutPDF ToolsAdd to favoritesDownload CitationsTrack CitationsPermissions ShareFacebookTwitterLinkedInRedditEmail ExcerptTo the editor: In a letter pointing out what we consider to be serious defects in a study published in Annals (1), we noted that "librarians who formulated and conducted the [MEDLINE] searches had extensive prior experience with the computer programs provided by NLM, Dialog, and BRS, but virtually no experience with PaperChase" (2). Haynes and his colleagues (3) replied that our statement is "incorrect," and that "experience with all but the NLM service was limited to occasional use for all three librarians and was roughly equivalent to the experience with PaperChase."Yet, in a personal communication dated 10 January...References1.
